item.title: Fund managers are ramping up on stocks — and finding them overvalued
item.description: Fund managers are not letting price get in the way of loading up on stocks.

item.title: ‘I spend 5 hours a day on my portfolio’: I’m 70 and received $300K in a lawsuit. Here’s my foolproof financial plan.
item.description: “It’s important to find a way to manage your emotions to prevent them from damaging your financial and personal future.”

item.title: My fiancée and I are 61. I’m moving into her home. How do we divide the expenses fairly?
item.description: “Once I have moved in with her, the plan is to rent out my house.”

item.title: What 1.1 million messages say about how ChatGPT is actually used
item.description: ChatGPT use is growing fast, but it’s becoming a less a tool in the workplace and more for personal use.

item.title: ‘It’s a mess’: My unmarried friends bought a house together. What’s the best way for one to buy the other out?
item.description: “The couple is ending their relationship. What do they do with the house?”
